name: ape
lose_message: The intelligent apes took over and destroyed human civilization!

name: zombie
lose_message: Zombies overrun all the checkpoints and nobody is alive anymore...

name: plague
lose_message: The plague spread among all of humanity and devastated global health. Humanity is on its last limbs...

name: ai
lose_message: Artificial Intelligence took over the world and enslaved humanity. Freedom will soon be a concept long forgotten...

name: alien
lose_message: Aliens invaded and destroyed the human race. We stood no chance against their powerful forces...

name: sun
lose_message: The environment was ill-prepared for the sun to emit the CRE; all of civilization was blinded and burned to a crisp...

name: opioid
lose_message: The opioid crisis reached a peak and killed many of the greatest leaders and now there's only one thing left to ease our concerns...
